content:
IXpsFixedPageWriter Interface

In this Article

Defines methods for writing FixedPage parts to an XPS document.

Syntax

Declaration

public interface IXpsFixedPageWriter : System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IStoryFragmentProvider

Properties summary

LinkTargetStream

Gets a list of strings that identify the LinkTarget hyperlink points that are contained in the current page.
PageNumber

Gets the zero-based page number of this page.
PrintTicket

Sets the default printing options for the page.
Uri

Gets the URI of the fixed page.
XmlWriter

Gets an XmlWriter for writing XML markup to the page.

Methods summary

AddColorContext()

Adds a new XpsColorContext to the current page.
AddFont()

Adds a new XpsFont to the current page.
AddFont(Boolean)

Adds a new obfuscated XpsFont to the current page.
AddFont(Boolean,Boolean)

Adds a new obfuscated or restricted XpsFont to the current page.
AddImage(String)

Adds a new XpsImage with a specified MIME type to the current page.
AddImage(XpsImageType)

Adds a new XpsImage with a specified XpsImageType to the current page.
AddResource(Type,Uri)

Adds a new XpsResource to the current page.
AddResourceDictionary()

Adds a XpsResourceDictionary to the page.
AddThumbnail(XpsImageType)

Adds a thumbnail image of a specified XpsImageType to the current page.
Commit()

Flushes and closes the fixed-page writer.

Properties

  • LinkTargetStream

    Gets a list of strings that identify the LinkTarget hyperlink points that are contained in the current page.

    public System.Collections.Generic.IList<string> LinkTargetStream { get; }

    Property Value

    • IList<String>

      A list of strings that identify the LinkTarget hyperlink points that are contained in the page.

    Remarks

    The list of LinkTarget hyperlink points is available after the page has been written and the Commit method has been called.

    For information about LinkTarget elements see Section 3.2.3 "<LinkTarget> Element" in the XML Paper Specification (XPS) available for download at http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761.

  • PageNumber

    Gets the zero-based page number of this page.

    public int PageNumber { get; }

    Property Value

    • Int32

      The zero-based page number of this page.

    Remarks

    The PageNumber property returns the zero-based page number for this FixedPage of the document. (PageNumber value of zero is the first page.)

  • PrintTicket

    Sets the default printing options for the page.

    public System.Printing.PrintTicket PrintTicket { set; }

    Property Value

    • PrintTicket

      To be added.

  • Uri

    Gets the URI of the fixed page.

    public Uri Uri { get; }

    Property Value

    • Uri

      The URI of the fixed page.

  • XmlWriter

    Gets an XmlWriter for writing XML markup to the page.

    public System.Xml.XmlWriter XmlWriter { get; }

    Property Value

    • XmlWriter

      The XmlWriter for writing XML markup to the page.

    Example

    The following example shows how to use the XmlWriter method to obtain an XmlWriter. 

    // ------------------------- AddDocumentContent ---------------------------
/// <summary>
///   Adds a predefined set of content to a given document writer.</summary>
/// <param name="fixedDocumentWriter">
///   The document writer to add the content to.</param>
private void AddDocumentContent(IXpsFixedDocumentWriter fixedDocumentWriter)
{
    // Collection of image and font resources used on the current page.
    //   Key: "XpsImage", "XpsFont"
    //   Value: List of XpsImage or XpsFont resources
    Dictionary<string, List<XpsResource>> resources;

    try
    {
        // Add Page 1 to current document.
        IXpsFixedPageWriter fixedPageWriter =
            fixedDocumentWriter.AddFixedPage();

        // Add the resources for Page 1 and get the resource collection.
        resources = AddPageResources(fixedPageWriter);

        // Write page content for Page 1.
        WritePageContent(fixedPageWriter.XmlWriter,
            "Page 1 of " + fixedDocumentWriter.Uri.ToString(), resources);

        // Commit Page 1.
        fixedPageWriter.Commit();

        // Add Page 2 to current document.
        fixedPageWriter = fixedDocumentWriter.AddFixedPage();

        // Add the resources for Page 2 and get the resource collection.
        resources = AddPageResources(fixedPageWriter);

        // Write page content to Page 2.
        WritePageContent(fixedPageWriter.XmlWriter,
            "Page 2 of " + fixedDocumentWriter.Uri.ToString(), resources);

        // Commit Page 2.
        fixedPageWriter.Commit();
    }
    catch (XpsPackagingException xpsException)
    {
        throw xpsException;
    }
}// end:AddDocumentContent()

    // ------------------------- AddDocumentContent ---------------------------
/// <summary>
///   Adds a predefined set of content to a given document writer.</summary>
/// <param name="fixedDocumentWriter">
///   The document writer to add the content to.</param>
void AddDocumentContent (IXpsFixedDocumentWriter^ fixedDocumentWriter) 
{
   // Collection of image and font resources used on the current page.
   //   Key: "XpsImage", "XpsFont"
   //   Value: List of XpsImage or XpsFont resources
   Dictionary<System::String^,List<XpsResource^>^>^ resources;

   try
   {
      // Add Page 1 to current document.
      IXpsFixedPageWriter^ fixedPageWriter = fixedDocumentWriter->AddFixedPage();
      // Add the resources for Page 1 and get the resource collection.
      resources = AddPageResources(fixedPageWriter);

      // Write page content for Page 1.
      WritePageContent(fixedPageWriter->XmlWriter, "Page 1 of " + fixedDocumentWriter->Uri->ToString(), resources);
      // Commit Page 1.
      fixedPageWriter->Commit();

      // Add Page 2 to current document.
      fixedPageWriter = fixedDocumentWriter->AddFixedPage();

      // Add the resources for Page 2 and get the resource collection.
      resources = AddPageResources(fixedPageWriter);

      // Write page content to Page 2.
      WritePageContent(fixedPageWriter->XmlWriter, "Page 2 of " + fixedDocumentWriter->Uri->ToString(), resources);
      // Commit Page 2.
      fixedPageWriter->Commit();
   } catch (XpsPackagingException^ xpsException)
   {
      throw xpsException;

   } 
};// end:AddDocumentContent()

    ' ------------------------- AddDocumentContent ---------------------------
''' <summary>
'''   Adds a predefined set of content to a given document writer.</summary>
''' <param name="fixedDocumentWriter">
'''   The document writer to add the content to.</param>
Private Sub AddDocumentContent(ByVal fixedDocumentWriter As IXpsFixedDocumentWriter)
    ' Collection of image and font resources used on the current page.
    '   Key: "XpsImage", "XpsFont"
    '   Value: List of XpsImage or XpsFont resources
    Dim resources As Dictionary(Of String, List(Of XpsResource))

    Try
        ' Add Page 1 to current document.
        Dim fixedPageWriter As IXpsFixedPageWriter = fixedDocumentWriter.AddFixedPage()

        ' Add the resources for Page 1 and get the resource collection.
        resources = AddPageResources(fixedPageWriter)

        ' Write page content for Page 1.
        WritePageContent(fixedPageWriter.XmlWriter, "Page 1 of " & fixedDocumentWriter.Uri.ToString(), resources)

        ' Commit Page 1.
        fixedPageWriter.Commit()

        ' Add Page 2 to current document.
        fixedPageWriter = fixedDocumentWriter.AddFixedPage()

        ' Add the resources for Page 2 and get the resource collection.
        resources = AddPageResources(fixedPageWriter)

        ' Write page content to Page 2.
        WritePageContent(fixedPageWriter.XmlWriter, "Page 2 of " & fixedDocumentWriter.Uri.ToString(), resources)

        ' Commit Page 2.
        fixedPageWriter.Commit()
    Catch xpsException As XpsPackagingException
        Throw xpsException
    End Try
End Sub ' end:AddDocumentContent()

Methods

  • AddColorContext()

    Adds a new XpsColorContext to the current page.

    public System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsColorContext AddColorContext ();

    Returns

    • XpsColorContext

      The new color context resource that was added.

    Exceptions

    • ObjectDisposedException

      stem.IDisposable.Dispose* has been called.

    Remarks

    AddColorContext adds a new XpsColorContext to the document package and associates it with the current FixedPage.

  • AddFont()

    Adds a new XpsFont to the current page.

    public System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsFont AddFont ();

    Returns

    • XpsFont

      The new font resource that was added.

    Exceptions

    • ObjectDisposedException

      stem.IDisposable.Dispose* has been called.

    Remarks

    AddFont adds a new XpsFont to the document package and associates it with the current FixedPage.

    Example

    The following example shows how to use the AddFont method to add a font resource to a page. 

    // -------------------------- AddPageResources ----------------------------
private Dictionary<string, List<XpsResource>>
        AddPageResources(IXpsFixedPageWriter fixedPageWriter)
{
    // Collection of all resources for this page.
    //   Key: "XpsImage", "XpsFont"
    //   Value: List of XpsImage or XpsFont
    Dictionary<string, List<XpsResource>> resources =
        new Dictionary<string, List<XpsResource>>();

    // Collections of images and fonts used in the current page.
    List<XpsResource> xpsImages = new List<XpsResource>();
    List<XpsResource> xpsFonts  = new List<XpsResource>();

    try
    {
        XpsImage xpsImage;
        XpsFont  xpsFont;

        // Add, Write, and Commit image1 to the current page.
        xpsImage = fixedPageWriter.AddImage(XpsImageType.JpegImageType);
        WriteToStream(xpsImage.GetStream(), image1);
        xpsImage.Commit();
        xpsImages.Add(xpsImage);    // Add image1 as a required resource.

        // Add, Write, and Commit font 1 to the current page.
        xpsFont = fixedPageWriter.AddFont();
        WriteObfuscatedStream(
            xpsFont.Uri.ToString(), xpsFont.GetStream(), font1);
        xpsFont.Commit();
        xpsFonts.Add(xpsFont);      // Add font1 as a required resource.

        // Add, Write, and Commit image2 to the current page.
        xpsImage = fixedPageWriter.AddImage(XpsImageType.TiffImageType);
        WriteToStream(xpsImage.GetStream(), image2);
        xpsImage.Commit();
        xpsImages.Add(xpsImage);    // Add image2 as a required resource.

        // Add, Write, and Commit font2 to the current page.
        xpsFont = fixedPageWriter.AddFont(false);
        WriteToStream(xpsFont.GetStream(), font2);
        xpsFont.Commit();
        xpsFonts.Add(xpsFont);      // Add font2 as a required resource.

        // Return the image and font resources in a combined collection.
        resources.Add("XpsImage", xpsImages);
        resources.Add("XpsFont", xpsFonts);
        return resources;
    }
    catch (XpsPackagingException xpsException)
    {
        throw xpsException;
    }
}// end:AddPageResources()

    // -------------------------- AddPageResources ----------------------------
Dictionary<System::String^,List<XpsResource^>^>^ AddPageResources (IXpsFixedPageWriter^ fixedPageWriter) 
{
   // Collection of all resources for this page.
   //   Key: "XpsImage", "XpsFont"
   //   Value: List of XpsImage or XpsFont
   Dictionary<System::String^,List<XpsResource^>^>^ resources = gcnew Dictionary<System::String^,List<XpsResource^>^>();

   // Collections of images and fonts used in the current page.
   List<XpsResource^>^ xpsImages = gcnew List<XpsResource^>();
   List<XpsResource^>^ xpsFonts = gcnew List<XpsResource^>();

   try
   {
      XpsImage^ xpsImage;
      XpsFont^ xpsFont;

      // Add, Write, and Commit image1 to the current page.
      xpsImage = fixedPageWriter->AddImage(XpsImageType::JpegImageType);
      WriteToStream(xpsImage->GetStream(), image1);
      xpsImage->Commit();
      xpsImages->Add(xpsImage);    // Add image1 as a required resource.

      // Add, Write, and Commit font 1 to the current page.
      xpsFont = fixedPageWriter->AddFont();
      WriteObfuscatedStream(xpsFont->Uri->ToString(), xpsFont->GetStream(), font1);
      xpsFont->Commit();
      xpsFonts->Add(xpsFont);      // Add font1 as a required resource.

      // Add, Write, and Commit image2 to the current page.
      xpsImage = fixedPageWriter->AddImage(XpsImageType::TiffImageType);
      WriteToStream(xpsImage->GetStream(), image2);
      xpsImage->Commit();
      xpsImages->Add(xpsImage);    // Add image2 as a required resource.

      // Add, Write, and Commit font2 to the current page.
      xpsFont = fixedPageWriter->AddFont(false);
      WriteToStream(xpsFont->GetStream(), font2);
      xpsFont->Commit();
      xpsFonts->Add(xpsFont);      // Add font2 as a required resource.

      // Return the image and font resources in a combined collection.
      resources->Add("XpsImage", xpsImages);
      resources->Add("XpsFont", xpsFonts);
      return resources;
   } catch (XpsPackagingException^ xpsException)
   {
      throw xpsException;

   } 
};// end:AddPageResources()

    ' -------------------------- AddPageResources ----------------------------
Private Function AddPageResources(ByVal fixedPageWriter As IXpsFixedPageWriter) As Dictionary(Of String, List(Of XpsResource))
    ' Collection of all resources for this page.
    '   Key: "XpsImage", "XpsFont"
    '   Value: List of XpsImage or XpsFont
    Dim resources As New Dictionary(Of String, List(Of XpsResource))()

    ' Collections of images and fonts used in the current page.
    Dim xpsImages As New List(Of XpsResource)()
    Dim xpsFonts As New List(Of XpsResource)()

    Try
        Dim xpsImage As XpsImage
        Dim xpsFont As XpsFont

        ' Add, Write, and Commit image1 to the current page.
        xpsImage = fixedPageWriter.AddImage(XpsImageType.JpegImageType)
        WriteToStream(xpsImage.GetStream(), image1)
        xpsImage.Commit()
        xpsImages.Add(xpsImage) ' Add image1 as a required resource.

        ' Add, Write, and Commit font 1 to the current page.
        xpsFont = fixedPageWriter.AddFont()
        WriteObfuscatedStream(xpsFont.Uri.ToString(), xpsFont.GetStream(), font1)
        xpsFont.Commit()
        xpsFonts.Add(xpsFont) ' Add font1 as a required resource.

        ' Add, Write, and Commit image2 to the current page.
        xpsImage = fixedPageWriter.AddImage(XpsImageType.TiffImageType)
        WriteToStream(xpsImage.GetStream(), image2)
        xpsImage.Commit()
        xpsImages.Add(xpsImage) ' Add image2 as a required resource.

        ' Add, Write, and Commit font2 to the current page.
        xpsFont = fixedPageWriter.AddFont(False)
        WriteToStream(xpsFont.GetStream(), font2)
        xpsFont.Commit()
        xpsFonts.Add(xpsFont) ' Add font2 as a required resource.

        ' Return the image and font resources in a combined collection.
        resources.Add("XpsImage", xpsImages)
        resources.Add("XpsFont", xpsFonts)
        Return resources
    Catch xpsException As XpsPackagingException
        Throw xpsException
    End Try
End Function ' end:AddPageResources()
  • AddFont(Boolean)

    Adds a new obfuscated XpsFont to the current page.

    public System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsFont AddFont (bool obfuscate);

    Parameters

    • obfuscate
      Boolean

      true to obfuscate the font; otherwise, false.

    Returns

    • XpsFont

      The new font resource that was added.

    Exceptions

    • ObjectDisposedException

      stem.IDisposable.Dispose* has been called.

    Remarks

    AddFont adds a new XpsFont with optional obfuscation to the document package and associates it with the current FixedPage.

    Set the obfuscate parameter to true when you are legally obligated to obfuscate a licensed proprietary font. While obfuscation does not encrypt the font, it inhibits unzipping proprietary fonts and installing them separately for other uses.

    For more information about font obfuscation, see Section 2.1.7.3 "Embedded Font Obfuscation" in the XML Paper Specification (XPS) available for download at http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761.

    Example

    The following example shows how to use the AddFont method in order to add a font resource to a page. 

    // -------------------------- AddPageResources ----------------------------
private Dictionary<string, List<XpsResource>>
        AddPageResources(IXpsFixedPageWriter fixedPageWriter)
{
    // Collection of all resources for this page.
    //   Key: "XpsImage", "XpsFont"
    //   Value: List of XpsImage or XpsFont
    Dictionary<string, List<XpsResource>> resources =
        new Dictionary<string, List<XpsResource>>();

    // Collections of images and fonts used in the current page.
    List<XpsResource> xpsImages = new List<XpsResource>();
    List<XpsResource> xpsFonts  = new List<XpsResource>();

    try
    {
        XpsImage xpsImage;
        XpsFont  xpsFont;

        // Add, Write, and Commit image1 to the current page.
        xpsImage = fixedPageWriter.AddImage(XpsImageType.JpegImageType);
        WriteToStream(xpsImage.GetStream(), image1);
        xpsImage.Commit();
        xpsImages.Add(xpsImage);    // Add image1 as a required resource.

        // Add, Write, and Commit font 1 to the current page.
        xpsFont = fixedPageWriter.AddFont();
        WriteObfuscatedStream(
            xpsFont.Uri.ToString(), xpsFont.GetStream(), font1);
        xpsFont.Commit();
        xpsFonts.Add(xpsFont);      // Add font1 as a required resource.

        // Add, Write, and Commit image2 to the current page.
        xpsImage = fixedPageWriter.AddImage(XpsImageType.TiffImageType);
        WriteToStream(xpsImage.GetStream(), image2);
        xpsImage.Commit();
        xpsImages.Add(xpsImage);    // Add image2 as a required resource.

        // Add, Write, and Commit font2 to the current page.
        xpsFont = fixedPageWriter.AddFont(false);
        WriteToStream(xpsFont.GetStream(), font2);
        xpsFont.Commit();
        xpsFonts.Add(xpsFont);      // Add font2 as a required resource.

        // Return the image and font resources in a combined collection.
        resources.Add("XpsImage", xpsImages);
        resources.Add("XpsFont", xpsFonts);
        return resources;
    }
    catch (XpsPackagingException xpsException)
    {
        throw xpsException;
    }
}// end:AddPageResources()

    // -------------------------- AddPageResources ----------------------------

{

   //   Key: "XpsImage", "XpsFont"
   //   Value: List of XpsImage or XpsFont

   // Collections of images and fonts used in the current page.

   List<XpsResource^>^ xpsFonts = gcnew List<XpsResource^>();

   {

      xpsFonts->Add(xpsFont);      // Add font1 as a required resource.

      // Add, Write, and Commit image2 to the current page.
      xpsImage = fixedPageWriter->AddImage(XpsImageType::TiffImageType);
      WriteToStream(xpsImage->GetStream(), image2);
      xpsImage->Commit();
      xpsImages->Add(xpsImage);    // Add image2 as a required resource.

      // Add, Write, and Commit font2 to the current page.
      xpsFont = fixedPageWriter->AddFont(false);
      WriteToStream(xpsFont->GetStream(), font2);
      xpsFont->Commit();
      xpsFonts->Add(xpsFont);      // Add font2 as a required resource.

    ' -------------------------- AddPageResources ----------------------------
Private Function AddPageResources(ByVal fixedPageWriter As IXpsFixedPageWriter) As Dictionary(Of String, List(Of XpsResource))
    ' Collection of all resources for this page.
    '   Key: "XpsImage", "XpsFont"
    '   Value: List of XpsImage or XpsFont
    Dim resources As New Dictionary(Of String, List(Of XpsResource))()

    ' Collections of images and fonts used in the current page.
    Dim xpsImages As New List(Of XpsResource)()
    Dim xpsFonts As New List(Of XpsResource)()

    Try
        Dim xpsImage As XpsImage
        Dim xpsFont As XpsFont

        ' Add, Write, and Commit image1 to the current page.
        xpsImage = fixedPageWriter.AddImage(XpsImageType.JpegImageType)
        WriteToStream(xpsImage.GetStream(), image1)
        xpsImage.Commit()
        xpsImages.Add(xpsImage) ' Add image1 as a required resource.

        ' Add, Write, and Commit font 1 to the current page.
        xpsFont = fixedPageWriter.AddFont()
        WriteObfuscatedStream(xpsFont.Uri.ToString(), xpsFont.GetStream(), font1)
        xpsFont.Commit()
        xpsFonts.Add(xpsFont) ' Add font1 as a required resource.

        ' Add, Write, and Commit image2 to the current page.
        xpsImage = fixedPageWriter.AddImage(XpsImageType.TiffImageType)
        WriteToStream(xpsImage.GetStream(), image2)
        xpsImage.Commit()
        xpsImages.Add(xpsImage) ' Add image2 as a required resource.

        ' Add, Write, and Commit font2 to the current page.
        xpsFont = fixedPageWriter.AddFont(False)
        WriteToStream(xpsFont.GetStream(), font2)
        xpsFont.Commit()
        xpsFonts.Add(xpsFont) ' Add font2 as a required resource.

        ' Return the image and font resources in a combined collection.
        resources.Add("XpsImage", xpsImages)
        resources.Add("XpsFont", xpsFonts)
        Return resources
    Catch xpsException As XpsPackagingException
        Throw xpsException
    End Try
End Function ' end:AddPageResources()
  • AddFont(Boolean,Boolean)

    Adds a new obfuscated or restricted XpsFont to the current page.

    public System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsFont AddFont (bool obfuscate, bool addRestrictedRelationship);

    Parameters

    • obfuscate
      Boolean

      true to obfuscate the font; otherwise, false.

    • addRestrictedRelationship
      Boolean

      true to prevent modification of any text that uses the font; otherwise, false.

    Returns

    • XpsFont

      The new font resource that was added.

    Exceptions

    • ObjectDisposedException

      stem.IDisposable.Dispose* has been called.

    Remarks

    AddFont adds a new XpsFont with optional obfuscation or restrictions to the document package, and associates it with the current FixedPage.

    Set the obfuscate parameter to true when you are legally obligated to obfuscate a licensed proprietary font. While obfuscation does not encrypt the font, it inhibits unzipping proprietary fonts and installing them separately for other uses.

    For more information about font obfuscation and the use of restricted fonts see the XML Paper Specification (XPS) available for download at http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761.

    Example

    The following example shows how to use the AddFont method to add a font resource to a page. 

    // -------------------------- AddPageResources ----------------------------
private Dictionary<string, List<XpsResource>>
        AddPageResources(IXpsFixedPageWriter fixedPageWriter)
{
    // Collection of all resources for this page.
    //   Key: "XpsImage", "XpsFont"
    //   Value: List of XpsImage or XpsFont
    Dictionary<string, List<XpsResource>> resources =
        new Dictionary<string, List<XpsResource>>();

    // Collections of images and fonts used in the current page.
    List<XpsResource> xpsImages = new List<XpsResource>();
    List<XpsResource> xpsFonts  = new List<XpsResource>();

    try
    {
        XpsImage xpsImage;
        XpsFont  xpsFont;

        // Add, Write, and Commit image1 to the current page.
        xpsImage = fixedPageWriter.AddImage(XpsImageType.JpegImageType);
        WriteToStream(xpsImage.GetStream(), image1);
        xpsImage.Commit();
        xpsImages.Add(xpsImage);    // Add image1 as a required resource.

        // Add, Write, and Commit font 1 to the current page.
        xpsFont = fixedPageWriter.AddFont();
        WriteObfuscatedStream(
            xpsFont.Uri.ToString(), xpsFont.GetStream(), font1);
        xpsFont.Commit();
        xpsFonts.Add(xpsFont);      // Add font1 as a required resource.

        // Add, Write, and Commit image2 to the current page.
        xpsImage = fixedPageWriter.AddImage(XpsImageType.TiffImageType);
        WriteToStream(xpsImage.GetStream(), image2);
        xpsImage.Commit();
        xpsImages.Add(xpsImage);    // Add image2 as a required resource.

        // Add, Write, and Commit font2 to the current page.
        xpsFont = fixedPageWriter.AddFont(false);
        WriteToStream(xpsFont.GetStream(), font2);
        xpsFont.Commit();
        xpsFonts.Add(xpsFont);      // Add font2 as a required resource.

        // Return the image and font resources in a combined collection.
        resources.Add("XpsImage", xpsImages);
        resources.Add("XpsFont", xpsFonts);
        return resources;
    }
    catch (XpsPackagingException xpsException)
    {
        throw xpsException;
    }
}// end:AddPageResources()

    // -------------------------- AddPageResources ----------------------------
Dictionary<System::String^,List<XpsResource^>^>^ AddPageResources (IXpsFixedPageWriter^ fixedPageWriter) 
{
   // Collection of all resources for this page.
   //   Key: "XpsImage", "XpsFont"
   //   Value: List of XpsImage or XpsFont
   Dictionary<System::String^,List<XpsResource^>^>^ resources = gcnew Dictionary<System::String^,List<XpsResource^>^>();

   // Collections of images and fonts used in the current page.
   List<XpsResource^>^ xpsImages = gcnew List<XpsResource^>();
   List<XpsResource^>^ xpsFonts = gcnew List<XpsResource^>();

   try
   {
      XpsImage^ xpsImage;
      XpsFont^ xpsFont;

      // Add, Write, and Commit image1 to the current page.
      xpsImage = fixedPageWriter->AddImage(XpsImageType::JpegImageType);
      WriteToStream(xpsImage->GetStream(), image1);
      xpsImage->Commit();
      xpsImages->Add(xpsImage);    // Add image1 as a required resource.

      // Add, Write, and Commit font 1 to the current page.
      xpsFont = fixedPageWriter->AddFont();
      WriteObfuscatedStream(xpsFont->Uri->ToString(), xpsFont->GetStream(), font1);
      xpsFont->Commit();
      xpsFonts->Add(xpsFont);      // Add font1 as a required resource.

      // Add, Write, and Commit image2 to the current page.
      xpsImage = fixedPageWriter->AddImage(XpsImageType::TiffImageType);
      WriteToStream(xpsImage->GetStream(), image2);
      xpsImage->Commit();
      xpsImages->Add(xpsImage);    // Add image2 as a required resource.

      // Add, Write, and Commit font2 to the current page.
      xpsFont = fixedPageWriter->AddFont(false);
      WriteToStream(xpsFont->GetStream(), font2);
      xpsFont->Commit();
      xpsFonts->Add(xpsFont);      // Add font2 as a required resource.

      // Return the image and font resources in a combined collection.
      resources->Add("XpsImage", xpsImages);
      resources->Add("XpsFont", xpsFonts);
      return resources;
   } catch (XpsPackagingException^ xpsException)
   {
      throw xpsException;

   } 
};// end:AddPageResources()

  • AddImage(String)

    Adds a new XpsImage with a specified MIME type to the current page.

    public System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsImage AddImage (string mimeType);

    Parameters

    • mimeType
      String

      The MIME type of the image to add.

    Returns

    • XpsImage

      The new image resource that was added to the page

    Exceptions

    • ObjectDisposedException

      stem.IDisposable.Dispose* has been called.

    • ArgumentNullException

      mimeType is null.

    • ArgumentException

      mimeType is an empty string.

    Remarks

    AddImage adds a new XpsImage with a specified mimeType to the document package and associates it with the current FixedPage.

    Example

    The following example shows how to use the AddImage method to add an image resource to a page. 

    // -------------------------- AddPageResources ----------------------------
private Dictionary<string, List<XpsResource>>
        AddPageResources(IXpsFixedPageWriter fixedPageWriter)
{
    // Collection of all resources for this page.
    //   Key: "XpsImage", "XpsFont"
    //   Value: List of XpsImage or XpsFont
    Dictionary<string, List<XpsResource>> resources =
        new Dictionary<string, List<XpsResource>>();

    // Collections of images and fonts used in the current page.
    List<XpsResource> xpsImages = new List<XpsResource>();
    List<XpsResource> xpsFonts  = new List<XpsResource>();

    try
    {
        XpsImage xpsImage;
        XpsFont  xpsFont;

        // Add, Write, and Commit image1 to the current page.
        xpsImage = fixedPageWriter.AddImage(XpsImageType.JpegImageType);
        WriteToStream(xpsImage.GetStream(), image1);
        xpsImage.Commit();
        xpsImages.Add(xpsImage);    // Add image1 as a required resource.

        // Add, Write, and Commit font 1 to the current page.
        xpsFont = fixedPageWriter.AddFont();
        WriteObfuscatedStream(
            xpsFont.Uri.ToString(), xpsFont.GetStream(), font1);
        xpsFont.Commit();
        xpsFonts.Add(xpsFont);      // Add font1 as a required resource.

        // Add, Write, and Commit image2 to the current page.
        xpsImage = fixedPageWriter.AddImage(XpsImageType.TiffImageType);
        WriteToStream(xpsImage.GetStream(), image2);
        xpsImage.Commit();
        xpsImages.Add(xpsImage);    // Add image2 as a required resource.

        // Add, Write, and Commit font2 to the current page.
        xpsFont = fixedPageWriter.AddFont(false);
        WriteToStream(xpsFont.GetStream(), font2);
        xpsFont.Commit();
        xpsFonts.Add(xpsFont);      // Add font2 as a required resource.

        // Return the image and font resources in a combined collection.
        resources.Add("XpsImage", xpsImages);
        resources.Add("XpsFont", xpsFonts);
        return resources;
    }
    catch (XpsPackagingException xpsException)
    {
        throw xpsException;
    }
}// end:AddPageResources()

  • AddImage(XpsImageType)

    Adds a new XpsImage with a specified XpsImageType to the current page.

    public System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsImage AddImage (System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsImageType imageType);

    Parameters

    • imageType
      XpsImageType

      The type of image to add to the page.

    Returns

    • XpsImage

      The new image resource that was added to the page

    Exceptions

    • ObjectDisposedException

      stem.IDisposable.Dispose* has been called.

    Remarks

    AddImage adds a new XpsImage with the specified XpsImageType to the document package and associates it with the current FixedPage.

    For example, imageType can be XpsImageType or XpsImageType. to add a JPEG or PNG XpsImage, respectively.

    Example

    The following example shows how to use the AddImage method to add an image resource to a page. 

    // -------------------------- AddPageResources ----------------------------
private Dictionary<string, List<XpsResource>>
        AddPageResources(IXpsFixedPageWriter fixedPageWriter)
{
    // Collection of all resources for this page.
    //   Key: "XpsImage", "XpsFont"
    //   Value: List of XpsImage or XpsFont
    Dictionary<string, List<XpsResource>> resources =
        new Dictionary<string, List<XpsResource>>();

    // Collections of images and fonts used in the current page.
    List<XpsResource> xpsImages = new List<XpsResource>();
    List<XpsResource> xpsFonts  = new List<XpsResource>();

    try
    {
        XpsImage xpsImage;
        XpsFont  xpsFont;

        // Add, Write, and Commit image1 to the current page.
        xpsImage = fixedPageWriter.AddImage(XpsImageType.JpegImageType);
        WriteToStream(xpsImage.GetStream(), image1);
        xpsImage.Commit();
        xpsImages.Add(xpsImage);    // Add image1 as a required resource.

        // Add, Write, and Commit font 1 to the current page.
        xpsFont = fixedPageWriter.AddFont();
        WriteObfuscatedStream(
            xpsFont.Uri.ToString(), xpsFont.GetStream(), font1);
        xpsFont.Commit();
        xpsFonts.Add(xpsFont);      // Add font1 as a required resource.

        // Add, Write, and Commit image2 to the current page.
        xpsImage = fixedPageWriter.AddImage(XpsImageType.TiffImageType);
        WriteToStream(xpsImage.GetStream(), image2);
        xpsImage.Commit();
        xpsImages.Add(xpsImage);    // Add image2 as a required resource.

        // Add, Write, and Commit font2 to the current page.
        xpsFont = fixedPageWriter.AddFont(false);
        WriteToStream(xpsFont.GetStream(), font2);
        xpsFont.Commit();
        xpsFonts.Add(xpsFont);      // Add font2 as a required resource.

        // Return the image and font resources in a combined collection.
        resources.Add("XpsImage", xpsImages);
        resources.Add("XpsFont", xpsFonts);
        return resources;
    }
    catch (XpsPackagingException xpsException)
    {
        throw xpsException;
    }
}// end:AddPageResources()

  • AddResource(Type,Uri)

    Adds a new XpsResource to the current page.

    public System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsResource AddResource (Type resourceType, Uri resourceUri);

    Parameters

    • resourceType
      Type

      The type of resource to add.

    • resourceUri
      Uri

      The absolute path of the resource to add, or null.

    Returns

    • XpsResource

      The new XML Paper Specification (XPS) resource that was added.

    Exceptions

    • ArgumentNullException

      resourceType is null.

    • ObjectDisposedException

      stem.IDisposable.Dispose* has been called.

    • ArgumentException

      resourceType is an empty string.

    Remarks

    AddResource adds a new XpsResource to the document package, and associates it with the current FixedPage.

    If resourceUri is null, a unique resource Uri is automatically created.

  • AddResourceDictionary()

    Adds a XpsResourceDictionary to the page.

    public System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsResourceDictionary AddResourceDictionary ();

    Returns

    • XpsResourceDictionary

      The XpsResourceDictionary that was added to the page.

    Exceptions

    • ObjectDisposedException

      stem.IDisposable.Dispose* has been called.

    Remarks

    AddResourceDictionary adds a new XpsResourceDictionary to the document package and associates it with the current FixedPage.

  • AddThumbnail(XpsImageType)

    Adds a thumbnail image of a specified XpsImageType to the current page.

    public System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsThumbnail AddThumbnail (System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsImageType imageType);

    Parameters

    • imageType
      XpsImageType

      The image type of the thumbnail image to add to the page.

    Returns

    • XpsThumbnail

      The new thumbnail image resource that was added.

    Exceptions

    • InvalidOperationException

      AddThumbnail has already been called to add an image thumbnail for this page.

    • ObjectDisposedException

      stem.IDisposable.Dispose* has been called.

    Remarks

    AddThumbnail adds a new XpsImageType to the document package and associates it with the current FixedPage.

    For example, imageType can be XpsImageType or XpsImageType. to add a JPEG or PNG thumbnail image, respectively.

  • Commit()

    Flushes and closes the fixed-page writer.

    public void Commit ();

    Remarks

    Based on settings of XpsSerializationManager and XpsPackagingPolicy, such as FontSubsetterCommitPolicies and PackageInterleavingOrder, the flush operation of the Commit method may be delayed until the complete XpsDocument is closed.

    Example

    The following example shows how to flush and close the fixed-page writer with the Commit method. 

    // ------------------------- AddDocumentContent ---------------------------
/// <summary>
///   Adds a predefined set of content to a given document writer.</summary>
/// <param name="fixedDocumentWriter">
///   The document writer to add the content to.</param>
private void AddDocumentContent(IXpsFixedDocumentWriter fixedDocumentWriter)
{
    // Collection of image and font resources used on the current page.
    //   Key: "XpsImage", "XpsFont"
    //   Value: List of XpsImage or XpsFont resources
    Dictionary<string, List<XpsResource>> resources;

    try
    {
        // Add Page 1 to current document.
        IXpsFixedPageWriter fixedPageWriter =
            fixedDocumentWriter.AddFixedPage();

        // Add the resources for Page 1 and get the resource collection.
        resources = AddPageResources(fixedPageWriter);

        // Write page content for Page 1.
        WritePageContent(fixedPageWriter.XmlWriter,
            "Page 1 of " + fixedDocumentWriter.Uri.ToString(), resources);

        // Commit Page 1.
        fixedPageWriter.Commit();

        // Add Page 2 to current document.
        fixedPageWriter = fixedDocumentWriter.AddFixedPage();

        // Add the resources for Page 2 and get the resource collection.
        resources = AddPageResources(fixedPageWriter);

        // Write page content to Page 2.
        WritePageContent(fixedPageWriter.XmlWriter,
            "Page 2 of " + fixedDocumentWriter.Uri.ToString(), resources);

        // Commit Page 2.
        fixedPageWriter.Commit();
    }
    catch (XpsPackagingException xpsException)
    {
        throw xpsException;
    }
}// end:AddDocumentContent()

    // ------------------------- AddDocumentContent ---------------------------
/// <summary>
///   Adds a predefined set of content to a given document writer.</summary>
/// <param name="fixedDocumentWriter">
///   The document writer to add the content to.</param>
void AddDocumentContent (IXpsFixedDocumentWriter^ fixedDocumentWriter) 
{
   // Collection of image and font resources used on the current page.
   //   Key: "XpsImage", "XpsFont"
   //   Value: List of XpsImage or XpsFont resources
   Dictionary<System::String^,List<XpsResource^>^>^ resources;

   try
   {
      // Add Page 1 to current document.
      IXpsFixedPageWriter^ fixedPageWriter = fixedDocumentWriter->AddFixedPage();
      // Add the resources for Page 1 and get the resource collection.
      resources = AddPageResources(fixedPageWriter);

      // Write page content for Page 1.
      WritePageContent(fixedPageWriter->XmlWriter, "Page 1 of " + fixedDocumentWriter->Uri->ToString(), resources);
      // Commit Page 1.
      fixedPageWriter->Commit();

      // Add Page 2 to current document.
      fixedPageWriter = fixedDocumentWriter->AddFixedPage();

      // Add the resources for Page 2 and get the resource collection.
      resources = AddPageResources(fixedPageWriter);

      // Write page content to Page 2.
      WritePageContent(fixedPageWriter->XmlWriter, "Page 2 of " + fixedDocumentWriter->Uri->ToString(), resources);
      // Commit Page 2.
      fixedPageWriter->Commit();
   } catch (XpsPackagingException^ xpsException)
   {
      throw xpsException;

   } 
};// end:AddDocumentContent()

    ' ------------------------- AddDocumentContent ---------------------------
''' <summary>
'''   Adds a predefined set of content to a given document writer.</summary>
''' <param name="fixedDocumentWriter">
'''   The document writer to add the content to.</param>
Private Sub AddDocumentContent(ByVal fixedDocumentWriter As IXpsFixedDocumentWriter)
    ' Collection of image and font resources used on the current page.
    '   Key: "XpsImage", "XpsFont"
    '   Value: List of XpsImage or XpsFont resources
    Dim resources As Dictionary(Of String, List(Of XpsResource))

    Try
        ' Add Page 1 to current document.
        Dim fixedPageWriter As IXpsFixedPageWriter = fixedDocumentWriter.AddFixedPage()

        ' Add the resources for Page 1 and get the resource collection.
        resources = AddPageResources(fixedPageWriter)

        ' Write page content for Page 1.
        WritePageContent(fixedPageWriter.XmlWriter, "Page 1 of " & fixedDocumentWriter.Uri.ToString(), resources)

        ' Commit Page 1.
        fixedPageWriter.Commit()

        ' Add Page 2 to current document.
        fixedPageWriter = fixedDocumentWriter.AddFixedPage()

        ' Add the resources for Page 2 and get the resource collection.
        resources = AddPageResources(fixedPageWriter)

        ' Write page content to Page 2.
        WritePageContent(fixedPageWriter.XmlWriter, "Page 2 of " & fixedDocumentWriter.Uri.ToString(), resources)

        ' Commit Page 2.
        fixedPageWriter.Commit()
    Catch xpsException As XpsPackagingException
        Throw xpsException
    End Try
End Sub ' end:AddDocumentContent()
